response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price tailored to ensure both parties benefit. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I propose a purchase price of $1,250,000. This offer not only secures your investment but also provides a significant return on your expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 1250000}
